title: HDFC ERGO General Insurance Company Limited
COST OF CONSUMABLE ITEMS -
sample_text:
Passenger Carrying Vehicle Package Policy - Annual shtriya Swasthya Bima Yojana
In consideration of the payment of additional premium paid of ₹_________ by the Insured and realized by the Insurer, 
notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained in the Policy, the Company hereby extends the Policy to cover expenses 
incurred by the Insured towards Consumable Items, in the event of damage to the Insured Vehicle and/or to its accessories (if 
Insured), arising out of any peril as covered under Section 1 of the Policy.
